title: 74. AITC: Indian Urbanism and the Surveillance Society with Manit Rastogi
itunes:title: 74. AITC: Indian Urbanism and the Surveillance Society with Manit Rastogi
description: This week we continue with the mini series Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with a transnational discussion on COVID19 response in India with architect Manit Rastogi. Here, we examine the social, political, and architectural implications of a pandemic on an individual to a city level.
content:encoded: This week we continue with the mini series Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with a transnational discussion on COVID19 response in India with architect Manit Rastogi. Here, we examine the social, political, and architectural implications of a pandemic on an individual to a city level.
